Room.Name: Highland Avenue/Lelion Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Highland Avenue and Lelion Way.
Room.LongDescription: Lelion Way runs west out of the intersection with Highland Avenue, which continues to the north and south. On the southwestern corner of the intersection you can see the Wakarimasu Park, a beautiful section of land that is the first thing people see when they enter the city. On the northwestern corner is the Temple of Harmonic Discord.
